        This is previous domain file: (define (domain roomnav)
  (:requirements :strips :negative-preconditions)
  (:types
    receptacle
    object
    sharpobject - object
    microwavereceptacle sinkbasinreceptacle fridgereceptacle - receptacle
  )

  (:predicates
    (at ?r - receptacle)
    (visited ?r - receptacle)
    (opened ?r - receptacle)
    (has_object ?r - receptacle ?o - object)
    (holding ?o - object)
    (clean ?o - object)
    (dirty ?o - object)
    (used ?o - object)
    (heated ?o - object)
    (cooled ?o - object)
    (sliced ?o - object)
    (openable ?r - receptacle)
  )

  (:action GotoLocation
    :parameters (?from - receptacle ?to - receptacle)
    :precondition (at ?from)
    :effect (and (not (at ?from)) (at ?to) (visited ?to))
  )

  (:action OpenObject
    :parameters (?r - receptacle)
    :precondition (and (at ?r) (openable ?r) (not (opened ?r)))
    :effect (opened ?r)
  )

  (:action CloseObject
    :parameters (?r - receptacle)
    :precondition (and (at ?r) (opened ?r))
    :effect (not (opened ?r))
  )

  (:action PickupObject
    :parameters (?o - object ?r - receptacle)
    :precondition (and (at ?r) (opened ?r) (has_object ?r ?o) (not (holding ?o)))
    :effect (and (holding ?o) (not (has_object ?r ?o)))
  )

  (:action PutObject
    :parameters (?o - object ?r - receptacle)
    :precondition (and (at ?r) (opened ?r) (holding ?o))
    :effect (and (has_object ?r ?o) (not (holding ?o)))
  )

  (:action useObject
    :parameters (?o - object)
    :precondition (holding ?o)
    :effect (used ?o)
  )

  (:action HeatObject
    :parameters (?o - object ?r - microwavereceptacle)
    :precondition (and (at ?r) (holding ?o))
    :effect (heated ?o)
  )

  (:action CleanObject
    :parameters (?o - object ?r - sinkbasinreceptacle)
    :precondition (and (at ?r) (holding ?o) (dirty ?o))
    :effect (and (clean ?o) (not (dirty ?o)))
  )

  (:action CoolObject
    :parameters (?o - object ?r - fridgereceptacle)
    :precondition (and (at ?r) (holding ?o))
    :effect (cooled ?o)
  )

  (:action SliceObject
    :parameters (?r - receptacle ?co - object ?sharp_o - sharpobject)
    :precondition (and (at ?r) (holding ?co) (has_object ?r ?sharp_o) (not (holding ?sharp_o)))
    :effect (sliced ?co)
  )
)

 (define (domain roomnav)
  (:requirements :strips :negative-preconditions)
  (:types
    receptacle
    object
    sharpobject - object
    microwavereceptacle sinkbasinreceptacle fridgereceptacle - receptacle
  )

  (:predicates
    (at ?r - receptacle)
    (visited ?r - receptacle)
    (opened ?r - receptacle)
    (has_object ?r - receptacle ?o - object)
    (holding ?o - object)
    (clean ?o - object)
    (dirty ?o - object)
    (used ?o - object)
    (heated ?o - object)
    (cooled ?o - object)
    (sliced ?o - object)
    (openable ?r - receptacle)
  )

  (:action GotoLocation
    :parameters (?from - receptacle ?to - receptacle)
    :precondition (at ?from)
    :effect (and (not (at ?from)) (at ?to) (visited ?to))
  )

  (:action OpenObject
    :parameters (?r - receptacle)
    :precondition (and (at ?r) (openable ?r) (not (opened ?r)))
    :effect (opened ?r)
  )

  (:action CloseObject
    :parameters (?r - receptacle)
    :precondition (and (at ?r) (opened ?r))
    :effect (not (opened ?r))
  )

  (:action PickupObject
    :parameters (?o - object ?r - receptacle)
    :precondition (and (at ?r) (opened ?r) (has_object ?r ?o) (not (holding ?o)))
    :effect (and (holding ?o) (not (has_object ?r ?o)))
  )

  (:action PutObject
    :parameters (?o - object ?r - receptacle)
    :precondition (and (at ?r) (opened ?r) (holding ?o))
    :effect (and (has_object ?r ?o) (not (holding ?o)))
  )

  (:action useObject
    :parameters (?o - object)
    :precondition (holding ?o)
    :effect (used ?o)
  )

  (:action HeatObject
    :parameters (?o - object ?r - microwavereceptacle)
    :precondition (and (at ?r) (holding ?o))
    :effect (heated ?o)
  )

  (:action CleanObject
    :parameters (?o - object ?r - sinkbasinreceptacle)
    :precondition (and (at ?r) (holding ?o) (dirty ?o))
    :effect (and (clean ?o) (not (dirty ?o)))
  )

  (:action CoolObject
    :parameters (?o - object ?r - fridgereceptacle)
    :precondition (and (at ?r) (holding ?o))
    :effect (cooled ?o)
  )

  (:action SliceObject
    :parameters (?r - receptacle ?co - object ?sharp_o - sharpobject)
    :precondition (and (at ?r) (holding ?co) (has_object ?r ?sharp_o) (not (holding ?sharp_o)))
    :effect (sliced ?co)
  )
)
